thread.title: Aces Manager, Phil Nevin could be headed back to the major league
thread.title_full: Aces Manager, Phil Nevin could be headed back to the major league

title: Aces Manager, Phil Nevin could be headed back to the major league
text: Share Updated: 10/11 10:58 pm RENO, Nev. (MyNews4.com & KRNV) -- R ight now there are four major league baseball teams looking for new managers and according to fansided.com, former big leaguer and Reno Aces' manager Phil Nevin is rumored to be a candidate for three of the positions. N evin just completed his second year in Reno, his first year in the biggest little city he led the club to the 2014 Pacific Coast League finals. I n his playing days, Nevin was the first overall pick in the 1992 MLB draft and played twelve seasons in the majors, he was also named to the National League All Star Team in 2001. T he report indicates, the Miami Marlins, San Diego Padres and Washington Nationals are the three teams interested in the minor league manager.
